requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intergrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card, GTX 770 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 equivalent DX11 GPU
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

results.name: Adventures of a Lonely Pixel (LD51 Original Version)
